summary: Provides a high‑level conversion engine that selects appropriate back‑ends and processing pipelines to transform documents from various source formats into target formats, supporting configurable formatting options and both single‑document and batch conversions while tracking conversion status.
business_intent: Allow applications to reliably convert documents (e.g., PDF, Word, HTML) into desired output representations such as plain text, structured JSON, or other formats, supporting downstream indexing, analysis, or archival workflows.
